entry.source: I'm looking for a way to save my sister,{F801}who suffers from a lung disease. I want you{F801}to find a certain {F804,5}medicine{F804,0} from the world{F801}below ground. Maybe you can find some in{F801}the hospital in Tsukiji. If you do find{F801}any, please bring some back.{F801}
